physical_appearance:The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a large group of people. They make up four rows
 with the first row comprising of seated personnel. Almost everyone is in formal attire
 with a suit and a tie. The background of the photograph shows the entrances of a large building. There are inscriptions on the brown border between the photograph and the frame
  Resolution of phootgraph is not high enough to identify more details.
